libavr

001

Visit us at: http://www.smileymicros.com

The central repository for the libavr library is located at: http://code.google.com/p/avrtoolbox/

Version 001 contains the serial, ring, and usart libraries as documented in Nuts&Volts June, July, and August 2011 Smiley's Workshop's 35, 36, and 37.

HOWEVER, only the serial libray is documented using the avrtoolbox process. The ring and usart libraries will have their documentation made compliant in time for the July and August issues.

Todo:
